oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Mantis is further said, by the Bushmen, to have given places their names. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-12. 7033 rev. and 7034 rev., note). 1) This story is found in Book VIII-12.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Mantis giver of names to places
